definition: competition schedule/the course of a race
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.chinese: 他在18洞的高爾夫賽程中得了85杆的成績。

sentences.english: The Organisers reserve the right to amend the Schedule of Races should circumstances require.
sentences.chinese: 如有需要，本會將保留修改賽程表之權利。

sentences.english: The Organizers reserve the right to amend the Schedule of Races should circumstances require.
sentences.chinese: 如有需要，本會將保留修改賽程表之權利。

sentences.english: The adverse weather conditions over the past few months have left Liverpool with a host of re-arranged fixtures.
sentences.chinese: 幾個月糟糕的天氣讓利物浦一再重新安排賽程。

sentences.english: Lazio, about to start it's Intertoto adventure in some days.
sentences.chinese: 拉齊奧還有幾天就要開始他們國際託托杯的賽程。

sentences.english: Most marathoners fail to use sports drinks properly during the race.
sentences.chinese: 大多數馬拉松人在賽程中沒有正確地使用運動飲料。

sentences.english: The Lakers were 24-11 at that point, despite a difficult early schedule.
sentences.chinese: 艱苦的賽程之下，湖人依舊拿到24勝11負。

sentences.english: Fixture congestion is becoming a problem all round.
sentences.chinese: 過度頻密的賽程開始在各地成爲一個問題。

sentences.english: Teams have the totally different game schedules.
sentences.chinese: 每個球隊的賽程表不盡相同。

sentences.english: When can we get the program of this Championships?
sentences.chinese: 我們什麼時候可以拿到錦標賽賽程表？

sentences.english: I really wasn’t ready to endure the twenty-seven mile race.
sentences.chinese: 說真的，我還沒有準備好忍受這27英里的賽程。

sentences.english: I hope the tournament comes back on the schedule again.
sentences.chinese: 我希望這個賽事會再回到賽程表上。

sentences.english: Special Thanks for the Organizer provide match schedule.
sentences.chinese: 特別鳴謝主辨機構提供比賽賽程。

sentences.english: Some runners collapsed due to dehydration during the marathon.
sentences.chinese: 在馬拉松的賽程中有些跑者因爲脫水而累倒了。

sentences.english: Please note: These fixtures are provisional only and will change. Kick-off times and dates to be finalised.
sentences.chinese: 這些只是初步賽程，開賽日期時間有待最後確定。

sentences.english: In this favorable stretch of schedule, Nuggets are just 4-8 with Iverson.
sentences.chinese: 在這段有利的賽程，有答案的掘金僅獲得4勝8負。

definition: to turn white-hot/to intensify/to reach a climax
preliminary contest/initial heats of a competition
prepared against war/to prepare for war/warmongering
(sports) semifinal or quarterfinal/to compete in a semifinal (or a quarterfinal)
open ball (math.)/to start a ball game/to kick off (soccer)/to tee off (golf)
to compete/to take part (in a sports event)
Salt Lake City, capital of Utah
